items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, update, and comment on tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can edit task details simultaneously without data loss
Comments on tasks are visible to all team members within 2 seconds of posting
Task status updates are reflected in all connected clients within 2 seconds
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Average response time for updates should be under 2 seconds

notes: User input was high-level; assumed core task management features exist and focus is on adding team collaboration with real-time updates.
